page.title: 05Public Houses/Clubs
page.content:
Two public houses and a Working Men's Club serve the village and its surrounds. The 'Golden Fleece' at Perry Street regularly provides musical entertainment, and all have Skittle Alleys. Skittles is a popular sport in the region, as are darts and snooker, and teams represent their 'home' venue in local league competitions.
The 'Poppe Inne' celebrates a traditional custom each year when a 'candle auction' is held for the rights to a certain field for the coming year. The last bid made when the candle flame goes out is the successful one, and only a small number of people are eligible to take part.
